Name: Kenya e visa
Title: Amazing Trip
Review: It was really an awesome experience to travel Jaipur. https://pl.tripadvisor.com/Attraction_Review-g304555-d11876911-Reviews-EleJaipur-Jaipur_Jaipur_District_Rajasthan.html

Name: Tech gyan
Title: Good tourist point
Review: Well it was such an awesome ethnicity and especially the wild like safari experience is so admirable

Name: Sarvraj S
Title: Vacations
Review: It was a nice welcome.we spent good time with elephants ,staff was kind and helpful in every activities. Good experience,must come in jaipur!

Name: Oliver T
Title: Dangerous experience!!!
Review: Avoid at all cost!! This is not safe at all, I will explain what happened during my visit:First of all, we go there with our driver, and we sit down with the guy who explain everything from his cellphone, he explain the packages and to be honest, even for Europeans is very expensive (over ‚Ç¨60 for 1h) I told him I only wanted to ride the elephant, he said for half an hour it would cost me 2500 rupies (20-30‚Ç¨) I accepted that offer, and I sat on the elephants neck. First 10 minutes were amazing, first time being elephant it was an incredible moment, then the elephant started getting angry by breathing hard and harder, and later he started making sounds with his trump louder and louder and i said to the guy to calm him down (he did not speak English) he kept telling me it‚Äôs ok it‚Äôs ok, no problem, but then he started beating the elephant with his stick, and then it got a lot worse, the elephant was starting moving around, trying to get out of the situation, he got really upset and was making huge sounds with his trumpet. Scariest moment of my life, luckily for me, the elephant got close to an edge at the same level of my feet, and I jumped out of the animal to be safe. This animals are wild animals, it was 40 degrees to ride them, and if you look at YouTube videos of people killed by elephants you will see how dangerous it is, it literally can kill you.

Name: acu023
Title: One of the highlights of my trip!!!
Review: Absolutely had so much fun riding the elephant. It was very important to me that the elephants are being treated well and kept in a spacious village. I could tell that they are being looked after. The ride took about half an hour. It costed me a lot but it was worth the experience.

Name: DDR1234
Title: Elephants beautiful!
Review: Went on elephant ride in Jaipur and it was fabulous! We had so  much fun and it is very safe ! I will recommend it when you are in Jaipur go on an elephant ride.

Name: Rob U
Title: Disappointing
Review: We had been told this was a good place for elephants but it was too touristy. You should not paint elephants or ride them - they are animals!!

Name: 207niravp
Title: excited ride
Review: the very good excited ride of elephant maintain by government. One should try this. around 10 -15 minutes ride.

Name: Sweta P
Title: Good experience
Review: It was different experience when you visit this and see lovely Elephant, had a ride and we all friends really enjoyed a lot.

Name: RDS582014
Title: A must when visiting Amber Fort
Review: What lovely female elephants.  We enjoyed our ride with Rohini and her owner.  She was magnificent and so friendly! She raised her trunk when her owner requested her to say "hello" to us.  It was a great experience.

Name: julie t
Title: not nice
Review: I saw elephants shackled in souless concrete blocks. I saw a 'social area' that contained no socialising elelephants. Why would anyone want to paint an elephant?  The most unnatural place ive ever seen animals kept in. At least in zoos the animals are kept in a group not isolated like this.

Name: Ad√©rito B
Title: Elephant Ride
Review: A must do in Jaipur!! Dont miss it!!!An experience of a life time!Thank you Rani for the ride!!Special thanks to Salman and our guide Vinod (TripAdvisor and driver from Delhi)!

Name: Deepti S
Title: Fun day with fam - Elephant village
Review: Amazing experience to see the gentle beast and kids enjoyed their interaction as well. Painting and feeding was fun. Wasim is a great host. A MUST DO experience. highly recommended.

Name: Yoran V
Title: Elephant village
Review: Very fun activity and the elephants are treated very nice here you can feed them , paint them colours and drawings and eventually ride them without hurting them , there are over 130 elephants here in nice homeblocks and offcourse a very friendly staff , warm welcome and lovely people and if you visit kaipur india its a must üñíüëå

Name: offspringbrasil
Title: Unique
Review: Amazing elephant experience, with a great host!!!!We did the 20 minutes ride with the elephant feed.

Name: Sam M
Title: I believe our elephants for the ride at the Amber Fort came from here
Review: Our elephant ride at the Amber Fort is an experience we will never forget.  A bucket list item.  Clean, great guide....wonderful elephant.

Name: AskurAlas
Title: Nice experience
Review: definetely try climbing elephant by trunk. Nice owner. Choose better riding, walking is not that interesting, only if u cant or dont want to ride. Recommended. Thanks to Mr Joy

Name: Ingvar K
Title: Good experience with elephants
Review: Me and my friend did riding here and it was very nice. Staff was friendly and high class service. I would recommend this for everybody to come to elejaipur and meet mr. Joy. He is very kind person and all his staff.

Name: Alex B
Title: Elephant Ride
Review: Hi , that s good experience with elephants if you wanna see lots elephants fit them and painting in them that s  the right place.  If come to Jaipur come to elephant village.

Name: pez
Title: Dream came true
Review: Overwhelming experience! Great creatures so near, they offer a plenty of activities. IT was amezing to do this ND Joy is very good prsan hi give me good compani to do all thanks Joy

Name: Nathaniel T
Title: Jungle safari
Review: Had a blast riding with the elephants. Very affordable and great fun with the friends.  Don‚Äôt be shy and make sure to visit this place!

Name: Schlupfloch
Title: Amazing place but high prices
Review: Very nice, calm place. We spent a few hours walking around and watching the elephants eat. The people are all super friendly and kind.Entrance is 350Rs per person, rides or other activities like feeding cost each around 1000Rs. Although we didn't take any "activities" we had a good time exploring the village :)

Name: Eman B
Title: to see elephants it was always my dream to see elephants
Review: amazing views & elephants playing good service in here and nd nice to see the elephant thanks to give me good elephant

Name: Anna B
Title: It's so so wonderful place
Review: It's so good that's I come here and I fund my happiness I am so happy and really it's my first time and I will come back this place for sure

Name: jchimpo
Title: Very good experience!!
Review: Joy was great at explaining things and made us feel comfortable getting on the elephant before starting the ride. The elephants are well treated here with each elephant having their personal Mahavat (elephant rider / care taker). They have over 100+ elephants, best experience in Jaipur!

Name: Ash H
Title: Sanctuary for elephants
Review: Lovely village on the outskirts of Jaipur, gives you he opportunity to interact with the elephants. The staff were very helpful & you can tell they are kind to the elephants. Thank you for a wonderful experience!

Name: paolo h
Title: Real jaipur style
Review: All the activities were so fun and relax. Elephant ride, painting, feeding.Nice and kind people help all visitors. Recommend 100%!

Name: Nikhil P
Title: Amazing experience üòçüòç
Review: It was like a dream for me to take a ride on elephant üêò and finally it true... it was really good thanks to Mr. Salman for this amazing experience üòä

Name: Jonathan Flores
Title: Riding with elephants!
Review: Awesome experience riding with the elephants, feeding them and just being around them. People are very nice here and we were very welcomed. We had a great time! Very worth it!

Name: Paulina Guzman Gr
Title: Beat experience ever!
Review: People in the place was really nice, they are so kind and the service was excellent. The ride on the elephant was one of the nicest experiences on my life. If you are coming to Jaipur, this is a MUST place to come! Come and enjoy the experience, this is worth it üëåüèª!

Name: ≈ò√≥√ø ≈î√ºbe≈º K
Title: Elephant riding
Review: It was a amazing Palace to do a elephant ride and thanks nursing for give me a good facility in elephant village

Name: Gustavo D
Title: Elephant ride
Review: It was a very amazing experience, we ride an elephant for a good price, the team is the nice mat in Jaipur area. Prices are good as well.

Name: Julia G
Title: Elephant riding
Review: Amazing place! We asked 1000 questions and got 1000 answers about elephants. Definitely worth visiting, also because of the cheap price. We ride elephants and feed them with bananas for 1000 rupees each person because they respected our student budget üòÇüëåüèª

Name: Simon K
Title: Amazing Elephant trip!
Review: Had an amazing elephant trip with EleJaipur. Very nice operator threating the aminals in a good way. Had a long chat with him after the trip giving me special insight abouts Elephants and India in general. I do totally recommend to include this place whenever you travel to Jaipur!

Name: Nico B
Title: Nice experience
Review: It was a great day we had with elephants at elejaipur..we did ride the elephant..we loved feeding them..and the ride was bare back..total fun day..highly recommend..

Name: Luke R
Title: Nice elephant visiting
Review: I went to the elephant village and it was nice it was good to see that's the animals were in decent condition and would go back again for sure if you get a chance see the elephants of the east which are quite different to the elephants of the west (South Africa)

Name: Morgan H
Title: Wonderful safari on elephant
Review: It's was fantastic experience to spent some time with such an beautiful animals we did some activities with them such as ride on elephant was awesome  to be on top painting the washing feeding them !!!Salim fantastic person who help us a lot Highly recommended

Name: h_everett16
Title: A must visit location
Review: If all the place I've been to visit on my trip around India I would highly recommend coming the the elephant village. The elephants were looked after very well and there were an amazing amount of activities available. Yeah people who looked after them were also externally nice and very informative!!Would highly recommend coming to the elephant village!!!!

Name: Didier v
Title: Good value. Nice elephants. Friendly staff
Review: Payd 2200 rs for the two of us and had a fun elephant ride. The elephants are well taken care off and get plenty of food, which we found really important. The trails' environment need some improvement though, but they are working on it.

Name: Previn S
Title: Elephant tour
Review: This is the place to go for a proper elephant walk! The guides are well informed and they teach you all about the elephants, how to climb onto them using the trunk, how to ride without a saddle! I felt very relaxed, the walk was not rushed.. although we went in summer and it was super hot, the guide still offered an extra few minutes in the walk just to make the experience more worth while. After the ride we also got to feed the elephants a huge bag of bananas, chats with the well informed Salim and the rest of the crew.. absolutely no rush to leave, super accommodating teamüôè‚úåÔ∏èüí™üëåü§ò

Name: Majd W
Title: Elephant Tour
Review: I had a great time here. They offered me free refreshment, took me on the elephant ride and didn't rush me to get off. They taught me how to get up and down the elephant and I was able to practice as many times as I wanted. I fed the elephant and took pictures with no hassle. Overall, I strongly recommend this if you are in Jaipur. Just ask for Salim when you get there.

Name: Mazhweel A
Title: Solo Visit
Review: Visited elephant sanctuary and met wonderful people who also had good stories to share. Saw an elephant feed in the shed with good conditions

Name: Yinka O
Title: Awesome experience
Review: It was our pleasure to be with such a lovely elephant we road on elephant and feed some peanut and bananas to them that was great narsi co- owner he was really helpful Thanks a lot of such an awesome experience

Name: Sholto W
Title: Fantastic
Review: It was really nice with team of elejaipur I went their with my friends we went to elephant ride after the ride we spent special time with elephants thanks narsing to make us feel so special he is very great guy

Name: Lily P
Title: Incredible awesome time
Review: We went to elephant village it was like elephant all around you I felt really amazing to went very close to gentle giants.... and then I met narsi there he is really a god gifted guy he has 17 elephant there he explained me about the life of elephants then I did ride on elephant and I fed them bananas as well ....I will never forget this experience Thanks narsi and whole elejaipur team

Name: Tullia C
Title: Elephant Sanctuary
Review: You must go to the elephant sanctuary - wonderful elephants and people in a beautiful place. All the elephants are raised here, ranging from 8-63 which you can feed, wash, paint and ride. It was an amazing experience i'll never forget. Narsi the owner knows and cares a lot for these animals.

Name: Lukas W
Title: Nice place
Review: Me and my friend visit this place and it was really amazing to be there.... The Rode on elephant and then we Feed them some bananas and Grass and everybody should visit this place when you're in Jaipur.... We get to know many Things about elephant their by the owner narsi He is very nice Guy and speak many language.... And not forget Salim He took our some Great pics... Thank you elejaipur for making our Trip so nice and special thanks for narsi and Salim

Name: Guido W
Title: Amazing
Review: It was great to be there and be with a huge animal it was fantastic to feed the elephants and climb on them .....The team over there was absolutely very good and friendly..... the owner narsi was very kind person..... it was nice to take chai with narsi he gave us good knowledge about elephantsHighly recommended to everyone

Name: Hayden P
Title: My Bahulibali moment
Review: Got the chance to meet an elephant, Shaq. It was an amazing experience. You can tell they take very good care of their elephants. We got the chance to climb on to their neck from the trunk. So much fun! Thanks for the great time :)

Name: Lucas R
Title: Wonderful place for elephants!
Review: Very peaceful place! Me and my 2 other friends were very welcome, the Chai is good and the discussion as well.I recommend this place to have a great experience on elephants in the Elephants Village just few minutes outside Jaipur by tuk tuk.

Name: Clement T
Title: Amazing √©l√©phant experience
Review: It was a really amazing experience with the √©l√©phant in a peaceful place with friendly people and good thai Highly recommanded

Name: Andrewyourboy
Title: Awesome experience with elephants!
Review: Luckily we had the opportunity of arriving at the elephant village. We met Madin through a recommendation and we couldn't have been happier.  They are having good food lots of room for activities and great care. I have been to elephant sanctuaries in Thailand and this place was a much better experience.

Name: David D
Title: Amazing experience
Review: We come to india to visit more than monuments this place gave us the opportunity to relate with roxanne and shakuntala this two elephants where amazing we feed them and shower them. An experience i will never forget. Ask for saleem and narsi they will guide you the whole way. Cheers.

Name: jasonh
Title: Amazing elephants
Review: While visiting jaipur we wanted to do more than visit monuments, we wanted to have experiences. initially we were a little put off by the price but realised money was going to help home and rehabilitate the elephants. Each couple are assigned to their own elephant. It was a fantastic experience as you spent time getting to know your elephant and then going through the different activities with your elephant. The operation runs so smoothly and is incredibly professional - without losing the Indian authenticity. All staff are fantastic but specially narsing. Make sure you have a 100% battery for your camera!!because the guy there salim took great photos of us........The only regret you will have is if you don't go..... must recommend

Name: Junead K
Title: Tremendous and mesmerising
Review: Me and my girlfriend visit this place it was surprised that my girlfriend gave me on my birthday............ it was so amazing the elephant there was so nice and friendly. ...... it was our first time that we went this close to elephant it was fantastic the guide and owner over there  nursi is very funny guy and because of him we got to know many things about elephants we had a exceptional experience there we ride on elephant and then we fed some bananas to our elephant Shakuntala and the bottom line is this place is 110% recommended

Name: Rehan K
Title: Great experience with elephants
Review: I was there with my friends and it was fantastic experience with them the guys over there explain us about elephant very briefly and then we went to ride to ride i n jungle where we saw many species of birds and the ride was fun and then we spent some quality time with our elephant I think her name is shakuntla and the owner of elephant narsi was great man he's very knowledgeable person ...... I can't describe our feelings and emotions review so everyone should go there and check that out.... If you are visiting jaipur this is must recommended place

Name: Lau C
Title: Fanatastic experience
Review: It was amazing to be with elephant very looked after by owner we did ride on elephant its was amazing painting on them feed some choclate (bananas )Highly recommend

Name: hejiranyc
Title: Up close and personal with the elephants
Review: It's a bit out of the ray but definitely worth your while to ask about and find a driver who can take you to the "Elephant Village."  Guaranteed to be the most up close and personal experience with elephants.

Name: Stvnlswrth
Title: Amazing Elephant Experience
Review: Today we visited the Elephant experience in Jaipur where we got to feed the elephants, wash the elephants, ride the elephants and even paint them. Was really good fun and the elephants seem to enjoy there time here. The owner (Narsi) was friendly and had very good english.The elephants here were born in this place and have grown up here, you can see them being washed and bathed on the way in where they seem to be having so much fun. The elephant we saw was 32 years old and is currently looking for a male. Steven (UK) Would definitely recommend!

Name: Hailey D
Title: The best elephant park
Review: We loved meeting this amazing animal in personal..got to do rides,painting on the elephant,feeding lots of food..and bath...Go there for real experience of elephant..

Name: killaB3
Title: Ele in Jaipur
Review: The best elephant experience we ever had in our lifetime,.you can go for. Smooth ride ,washing,painting,feeding...highly recommended.
